name: Quick Cheeseburger Pie
author: Krystel
summary: For those nights when you want to try something new.
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
To Make Pat-in-Pan Pastry: In a medium bowl, mix 1 1/3 cups flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt
Cut in shortening until mixture resembles tiny peas
Add cold water 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring with a fork after each addition
Mix lightly just until pastry almost cleans sides of bowl
Pat into bottom and sides of an 8 inch pie pan
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes
To Make Filling: Crumble ground beef into a large skillet and saute over medium heat for 1 minute
Continue to saute until onion is browned, about 10 minutes
Sprinkle beef mixture with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 cup flour
Stir in pickle liquid, milk, pickles, and 1 cup shredded cheese
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes
Sprinkle top with remaining 1 cup cheese and bake an additional 5 minutes, until pastry is golden brown and cheese is bubbly
